At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first. products.title: Metz PVC Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Metz PVC Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind in Black. Made to measure from £16.15 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Metz PVC Blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from.  Waterproof and flame retardant, Metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the UK, especially with overlooked houses and office.This understated black, marbled, Black blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensAt Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Baltimore Black (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Baltimore Black (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: 25% Fibreglass/ 75% PVC
 	Louvre Width: 89mm &amp; 127mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
